distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for python-cryptography fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-25659: Attempted to mitigate Bleichenbacher attacks on RSA decryption (bsc#1178168).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: python-cryptography 3.2 is vulnerable to Bleichenbacher timing attacks in the RSA decryption API, via timed processing of valid PKCS#1 v1.5 ciphertext.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
